DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase III multi-center, double-masked, vehicle-controlled, randomized, parallel group study evaluating the efficacy, safety and tolerability of EBI-005 as compared to vehicle given as a topical ophthalmic solution in each eye to subjects with moderate to severe allergic conjunctivitis (AC) three times daily for 4 weeks. Approximately 250 subjects at approximately 8 centers in the US will be screened and enrolled into the study.
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Center Environmental Study for the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Ocular Allergic Conjunctivitis
